title: Namespaces
description1: Point collections. You can have a maximum of {{max}} namespaces on your service.
description2: Only the default namespace is non-aggregated. It includes all point clouds as they arrive.
description3: You can create aggregated namespaces for which a single point is stored for each configured interval.
deleteNamespaceToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while deleting the namespace
deleteNamespaceToastSuccessDescription: The namespace has been successfully deleted.
deleteNamespaceDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the {{name}} namespace?
formNamespaceErrorMaxLength: Please enter a maximum of {{max}} characters
formNamespaceNameErrorPattern: Must only contain numbers, letters or underscores
formNamespaceNameErrorDuplicate: A namespace with the same name already exists
formNamespaceShortTimeErrorPattern: Must be in short time format. E.g. 1D, 1H, 30m, 30S
formNamespaceDurationResolutionErrorPatt: Retention time must be greater than resolution
formNamespaceDurationBlockSizeErrorPatte: The retention period must be greater than the retention period of an in-memory block
formNamespaceFieldTypeDescription: Only the default namespace can be non-aggregated.
formNamespaceFieldPeriodDurationDescript: The data retention duration for the namespace in short time format.
formNamespaceFieldResolutionDescription: Resolution time for an aggregated namespace in short time format.
formNamespaceFieldWritesToCommitLogEnabl: Defines whether M3DB should include writes to this namespace in the commitlog.
formNamespaceFieldSnapshotEnabledDescrip: Defines whether M3DB should create snapshot files for this namespace.
formNamespaceFieldBlockSizeDurationDescr: The amount of time a block is held in memory before it is written to disk, in short time format.
formNamespaceFieldBufferFutureDurationDe: Future duration for which writes on the namespace are still accepted, in short time format.
formNamespaceFieldBufferPastDurationDesc: Future duration for which writes on the namespace are already accepted, in short time format.
addNamespaceDescription: Create a new namespace on your service.
addNamespaceToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while adding the namespace
editNamespaceToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while modifying the namespace
